title: shESAcalanAyakam
sahitya:
shESAcalanAyakam bhajAmi vishESa phala pradAyakam


anupallavi

 bhASA ramaNa prabhrtya shESAmaranuta kaustubha bhUSAlankrta bahutara vESAtmaka vigraham


caraNam   mandahAsa vadanam svacchanda hrdaya sadanam sundara jita madanam mukundam madhusUdanam 
aravinda patra nayanam gOvindam uraga shayanam surabrnda satkrtA dhyayanam nanda nArAyaNam 
purandarAdi dikpAla sanandanAdi muni varALi vanditam abhinava guruguha nandita mananta kIrtim
